sentences.en: At a later news conference, he said differences should not be dramatized.
sentences.cn: 在后来的新闻发布会上，他说不应夸大分歧。

sentences.en: Bishop Daly said he was devastated by news of the Cardinal's death.
sentences.cn: 戴利主教说他听到红衣主教去世的消息后感到极为震惊和难过。

sentences.en: He has not yet been let in on the bad news.
sentences.cn: 他还不知道这个不幸的消息。

sentences.en: He made his comments at a news conference in Amsterdam.
sentences.cn: 他在阿姆斯特丹的记者招待会上发表了意见。

sentences.en: I hope to have some good news for you soon.
sentences.cn: 我希望很快就能给你好消息。

sentences.en: I use the short-wave radio to get the latest war news.
sentences.cn: 我用短波收音机收听最新的战事新闻。

sentences.en: I would just update them on any news we might have.
sentences.cn: 我们一有新消息我就会告诉他们。

sentences.en: Local news organizations are being criticized for sensationalizing the story.
sentences.cn: 当地的新闻机构因为对此事大肆渲染而备受指责。

sentences.en: News of 160 redundancies had sent tremors through the community.
sentences.cn: 将会裁员160人的消息在该团体中掀起了一阵骚动。

sentences.en: News of interest cuts came in the nick of time for borrowers.
sentences.cn: 对借款人来说，减息的消息来得正是时候。

sentences.en: She had heard the news-flash on a TV channel's news update.
sentences.cn: 她在一家电视台的新闻快讯中听到了这则简明新闻。

sentences.en: The drop in travel is bad news for the airline industry.
sentences.cn: 旅游热降温对航空业来说是个坏消息。

sentences.en: The news gave a fillip to the telecommunications sector.
sentences.cn: 这个消息给电信部门注入了一针强心剂。

sentences.en: The news programme goes out four times a week at peak time.
sentences.cn: 这档新闻节目每周在黄金时段播出4次。

sentences.en: The news will have delighted detractors of the scheme.
sentences.cn: 这条消息会让该方案的批评者感到高兴。

sentences.en: The television producer today has to be part news person, part educator.
sentences.cn: 今天的电视制片人必须既是新闻人，又是教育者。
